thread.section_title: Grossoshop.net 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Grossoshop.net 的点评意见 | www.grossoshop.net
thread.title: Tomaz

author: Tomaz
title: Tomaz
text:
Bought a Z11 Max on Grossoshop. The order & shipping was carried out without a problem. Notification on delivery status is on a professional level.
The phone had the unlocked bootloader and the correct twrp recovery was already flashed, which made the whole process of installing Combo Rom quite easy. Grossoshop rom was not bad, but i like to experiment.
Never tried 2-year warranty and hopefully i won't have to:) but from what i heard, this is much better handled than by other sellers, who sell chinese phones. So far it's been a great experience with grossoshop. Prices are a bit higher then the competition, but makes sense with this kind od great communication and a 2-year warranty. Can only recommend grossoshop.
5 Stars.
